column4: What is difference between building a packet and install a packet
yes, but why do you care if there's a variable?  Are you asking how to change your time zone?
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuTime describes how to set the timezone.  I don't have any TZ variable set in my environment but maybe applications will respect that if you set it
it's something in your shell's startup files
what you just said suggests you should check ~/.profile first

read ~/.profile.  If nothing there uses 'expr', then I'd move on to other relevant files.  If you can't find the culprit, rename these files one at a time until the issue goes away.  Then investigate further
